name: Dual Dragon
description:
DUAL DRAGON

An adventure puzzle-like game where your objective is to keep the balance between good and evil in a village full of cute dragons.

TEAM:

TIGERSONALEX - BG/Character Design

JOLLYGOODDAY - Props design/Animation of the main character

Marixil - Game Over screen

NIELISSON - Game/Lvl Design, Project leader, Graphics in general

NOCTURNAL LIGHTEREST and Horace - Programmer
